item.title: Characters With Character
item.description: Text can be as expressive as art, music, or a well placed line in a poem. Chinese characters have the potential to dance on the page - the individual strokes can flow and be combined in many ways. Characters With Character imbues an embodiment of action and state into Chinese characters themselves and explores expression through form. 点 (diǎn): point / dot / drop / speck 爆炸 (bào zhà): explosion / to explode 扩大 (kuò dà): to expand / to enlarge 融化 (róng huà): to melt / to thaw / to dissolve 拥挤 (yōng jǐ): crowded / to throng / congestion 故障 (gù zhàng): glitch/ malfunction 墨水 (mò shuǐ): ink 漩涡 (xuàn wō): swirl / vortex 像素 (xiàng sù): pixel

item.title: Growing Narratives
item.description: View Growing Narratives: Passage in Kernel Issue 2. “Dendrochronology, also called tree-ring dating, [is] the scientific discipline concerned with dating and interpreting past events…” 1 Tree rings can tell us a lot about the passing of time, their shapes and thicknesses telling us stories of the past. They represent time, growth, and nourishment. Reading a cross section is, however, also an interpretation. The memories we carry can be written and rewritten depending on how we tell our stories - in sustaining our rings, we grow our own narratives.

item.title: Life Plan
item.description: View Life Plan in Taper Issue #9 Folders are the perfect place to formulate a plan to accommodate all of the possibilities: how to proceed with a project, a future, a life. What other paths can be imagined? Choosing one folder enters you into a new realm, closed off to the other branches and revealing new directions. Can a life be planned out in your file explorer? Current work is on streamlining the creation process and including actual files.

item.title: Polanimation
item.description: Part of a research effort guided by Ticha Sethapakdi Polanimation explores how polarizers can be used as a passive display technology. The goal of Polanimation is to develop a design tool and fabrication process that allows users to create animated displays that take advantage of this effect. Polarizers are optical filters that allow only specific wavelengths of light to pass through. An interesting effect occurs when you place one polarizer in front of another: depending on the relative angles of the two polarizers, the opacity of the overlapping region changes.

item.title: Drawing for Designers
item.description: Sketches from MIT's Drawing for Designers studio class. Studies in movement, perspective, and lighting. This was the semester interruped by the pandemic, leading to imaginative sketches, blending the real and the remembered. Many sketches were done from my room, adding elements of fantasy to transform the space into a space for speculation.
